posts.title: Whispers of the Breeze
posts.poem: In twilight's tender grasp they rise, The whispers of the breeze, Dancing leaves in moonlit skies, A secret told with ease.
posts.author: Emily Rivers

posts.title: Echoes of Silence
posts.poem: In stillness, silence softly weaves, Echoes linger in tranquil eaves , Unspoken words in quiet strife ,A symphony of muted life.
posts.author: Liam Serenade

posts.title: Serenade of the Stars
posts.poem: Midnight's curtain gently draws, Celestial serenade without flaws , Stars compose in silent light , A cosmic ballad in the night.
posts.author: Luna Evernight
